categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic planets

nodes.text: Tel III was the third planet of the Tel Minor system, located in the Expansion Region.
The planet was a ball of ash-covered rock which was crumbling to dust as it aged. Because of the planet's location within the planetary nebula, the skies of Tel III were greenish in color.
This remote planet was the location of the Rebel Alliance Oracle Base, established shortly before the Battle of Yavin.
